title: how does a soraka with level one boots out run a yi with his ult and upgraded boots
body:
54367

This is always happening, if I am chasing someone they immediately go faster than me no matter what items I have no matter how much faster than them I am.. WTF

replies.body: Do you happen to have a replay of that happening? There's a chance Soraka had specific items or something working in her favor, but with only basic boots I don't believe she should be outrunning a Yi using his ult AND with upgraded boots.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=r36N7iPH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T04:29:57.665+0000)
>
> Do you happen to have a replay of that happening? There's a chance Soraka had specific items or something working in her favor, but with only basic boots I don't believe she should be outrunning a Yi using his ult AND with upgraded boots.

54367

There have been Many times were I have been out paced by champs who had much slower move speed than me.  Most of the time you can see the moment were I stop gaining on them, it's almost like we click into a certain amount of space and the game won't let me get closer.

I often build speed boots on scion but it never helps, most games when I die people walk away and even activating him doesn't let me get close enough to hit them.
